entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm build failure in System.Text.Json.Tests - The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly #104004
  • VectorT.ConditionalSelect doesn’t get optimized for const masks on non-AVX512 platforms #104001
  • Socket.InternalShutdown is ignoring LingerOption #104000
  • Possible locking issues in PollingWildCardChangeToken? #103997
  • [android] .NET 9 p6, trimmer step no longer saving changes to disk #103987
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(className[9] == '\0') || (strcmp(className + 9, "\`1") == 0)' in 'System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Boxed_Vector512DebugView\`1[System.__Canon]:get_UInt64View_Unbox():ulong[]:this' during 'Pre-import' #103986
    9.0.0
  • Runtime tests fail to AOT compile on Apple mobile platforms #103982
    9.0.0
  • Failed test: JIT/jit64/opt/cse/VolatileTest_op_* for add, or and shr #103980
    9.0.0
  • Upgrade Emscripten SDK for .NET 9 #103977
  • Consider to enable FEATURE_MULTICASTSTUB_AS_IL for Windows x86 #103958
  • Debugger Crashes when using breakpoints with a compiled runtime in debug mode _CrtlsValidHeapPointer(block) #103955
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24321.3] Apps launch failed with error: System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'BinaryFormatter serialization and deserialization have been removed #103952
  • Investigate folding identical methods with genericness by default #103951
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 23 Regressions on 6/22/2024 6:46:45 PM #103974
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 33 Regressions on 6/21/2024 6:31:57 PM #103972
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 6 Regressions in Perf_Vector on 6/20/2024 7:04:47 AM #103971
  • Wasm Linux OOM failure in System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.RentAndReturnManyOfTheSameSize_NoneAreSame #103943
  • RegexGenerator generating code with error CS0165. #103942
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_Move_Tests.File_Move_SynchronizingObject #103940
  • Test failure: Interop/PInvoke/CriticalHandles/Test/Test/Test.cmd #103939

Closed

  • RequiresUnreferencedCode not suppressing warning from explicitly implemented generic method using lambda method #98368
    9.0.0
  • Failure in the Exceptions smoke test with CFG #103798
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Proposal for Automatic Temporary Directory Management #98349
  • TarReader throws on archive that other tools accept #93763
    9.0.0
  • Set licence type on packages #97370
  • Support `DOTNET_CLI_HOME` for `corefx` #98276
  • Mac OS X: System.Diagnostics.Process mis-reporting CPU usage (dramatically) on Apple Silicon #98121
    8.0.x
  • DispatchProxy not working in dotnet 9 #103693
  • [API Proposal]: Acquire those managed objects that cannot be recycled through the GC. #103944
  • [QUIC] Support opening a new QUIC stream on the first connection that has streams available. #68380
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Implement connection scavenging #54968
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Create additional connections when maximum active streams is reached #51775
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] Support managing available streams on `QuicConnection` #101534
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [HTTP/3] Support multiple HTTP/3 connections #101535
    9.0.0
  • Flush(true) does not call fsync on first attempt #99445
  • .Net MAUI File.ReadAllText fails with Exception. #100603
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.File to have a method to read a file line by line #103137
  • Make libmsquic load failures actionable #87970
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 2 Regressions on 4/30/2024 1:50:24 PM #102281
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 4/30/2024 10:57:18 AM #101991
    9.0.0
  • [System.Threading.RateLimiting] Request Leaky Bucket rate limiter #103800
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97147
    9.0.0
  • [iOS] Implement validations to prevent the disabling of HybridGlobalization #96020
  • [iOS] Make HybridGlobalization the default when nativeaot is enabled #90633
    9.0.0
  • Windows 11 issue with Dns.GetHostName and Dns.GetHostByName #91677
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 8 Regressions on 3/11/2024 8:28:14 PM #99966
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 4/9/2024 5:02:41 AM #100923
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 4/22/2024 7:01:47 PM #101723
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in Benchmark.GetChildKeysTests #91624
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json not properly disposing enumerators on exceptions #50851
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix assertion/possible deadlock in thread shutdown in the presence of ThreadStatics on collectible assemblies #104003
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs `CreateMaskForFirstActiveElement` and `CreateMaskForNextActiveElement` #104002
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Rename `Module::IsReflection` and `PEAssembly::IsDynamic` to `IsReflectionEmit` #103999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • fix the size passed to grow_heap_segment from loh_allocate_in_condemned #103998
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Minimize locking duration for decommitLock #103996
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use a proper check rather than an assert #103995
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose the constants in TimeSpan #103993
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Fix #97736 in MemoryCache.cs with a lock around the TriggerOvercapacityC... method #103992
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken support for LoadIntoBufferAsync #103991
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove `MODULE_READY_FOR_TYPELOAD` flag on `Module` #103990
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.VectorTableLookup() #103989
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix static-lib AOT Mono builds #103988
    area-Build-mono
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with Json #103985
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [8.0] Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103984
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103983
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Add missing dependency install instructions for Linux cross-building #103981
    documentation, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove format job runs from coreclr outerloop testing #103979
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize performance of `Measurement` constructor #103978
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #103975
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use the same method to generate DllImportAttribute in local methods and P/Invoke forwarders #103973
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Remove NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported feature switch #103970
    area-System.Reflection
  • Added test for missing cookie header value #103969
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add System.Text fuzzing for encoders #103968
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [release/6.0] Surface error when `emcc -version` failed. #103967
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix gather tests #103966
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix potential Debug.Assert in QuicListener #103965
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0] Fix incorrect time patterns for some cultures on browser in `HybridGlobalization` #103964
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Ensure GetMemoryStatus behave consistently between Windows and Linux in case a container limit is changed without calling RefreshMemoryLimit #103963
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve resiliency when rooting broken assemblies #103962
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable `AllCulturesTest` for HybridGlobalization #103961
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • Print linking instructions for NativeLib=static #103960
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Enable `GetAsync_ManyDifferentResponseHeaders_ParsedCorrectly` #103959
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono][interp] Improve precision of native offset estimation #103956
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][MT] Make ChangeLocalTimeZone thread-safe #103953
    arch-wasm, os-browser
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend RunClassConstructor intrinsic handling to accept NonPublicConstructors #103947
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Ensure static constructor is reflection-callable when NonPublicConstructors were kept #103946
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add one bit padding to GC info #103938
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #103937
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix detection of lambda and local function generated names #103916
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Report `RhpInitialDynamicInterfaceDispatch` reference in gfids #103948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Pass RID to msbuild task #103508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.Splice() #103567
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Use SRM's TypeName parser in ILLink #103740
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Migrating EsrpCodeSigning Task From Version 4 to Version 5 #102948
    area-Infrastructure
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove Module::IsManifest and IsPEFile #103921
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle TYP_DOUBLE on arm softFP similarly to TYP_LONG #103869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add troubleshooting guideline link to PNSE in Quic #103890
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs - `Test*`, `ExtractVector` #103739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Fix formatting after liveness change #103954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve perf of CredentialCache.GetCredential #103714
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Clean up liveness #103809
  • JIT: Use new ABI representation in `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #103856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #103372
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Avoid rare deadlocks when using TypeDescriptor #103835
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Try SimdUnicode for Utf8 validation #103860
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2482426 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono] Use correct cast_class for IntPtr[] #103841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Configuration.Binder source generator #103822
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Switch `genCall` to new ABI info and unify targets #103866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Update mono to support Unsafe.BitCast #103915
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Check for call interference when placing PUTARG nodes #103301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix #103485 #103935
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable sending activation to dispatch queue threads #102887
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert some more array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle QMARK properly for LCL_ADDR propagation #103909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Force cfg #103215
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • update parsing for manually configured proxy on Windows #103328
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • [release/8.0] Update ESRP Code Signing #103896
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid MakeGenericMethod in XmlSerializer #102482
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0] Update ESRP Code Signing #103895

  • Remove allocation of state machine in QuicStream.WriteAsync #103902
    area-System.Net
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796

    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Subtract prior entry size when adding entry to cache #103931
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add AppContext switch for OCSP Stapling #100917
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [wasi][mono] Fix conflicting naming for wasm import/export #103881

  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626

  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704

    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0

    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
